Question: Avalanche Computing Taiwan Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Avalanche Computing Taiwan Inc.

Product: hAIsten AI

- Reduces AI development cycle time by over 90%
- Leverages the power of multiple GPUs and low-code AI software
- Accelerated model training with multiple GPUs
- One-command deployment for AI models
- Real-time dashboard for monitoring model training status
- Supports AI model training and deployment on both cloud and edge devices
- Compatible with Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure cloud solutions
- Supports NVIDIA, Qualcomm, and OpenVino hardware
- Focus on providing low-code tools to speed up AI development and make programming life easier
